requests.name: The cricket leagues endpoint serves as a decode fo...
requests.description: The cricket leagues endpoint serves as a decode for the available leagues names, abbreviations, and URI paths.

queryParams.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: Team information.

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the cricket/leagues endpoint
A teamId returns information for that team only.

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
requests.description:
Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, and play-by-plays when applicable.  The 'eventId', 'box', and 'pbp' parameters below are only applicable for a specific game.
 Events will also provide you with schedule data.

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the cricket/leagues endpoint

Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box request.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'pbp=true'.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

Will return all events from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

Will return events from a specific series. See the league specific series decode endpoint for a complete list of series available for any given league.
 Default - No series restrictions

Will return events for the specified eventType only. See the league specific eventTypes decode endpoint for a complete list of event types available for any given league.
  Default - All event types

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: This gets the event (schedule) information for jus...
requests.description: This gets the event (schedule) information for just one team.  (Use the example above to return detailed event information).

requests.name: Cricket - Career stats for a single player

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the cricket/leagues endpoint
To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

Will return events from a specific series. See the league specific series decode endpoint for a complete list of series available for any given league.
 Default - No series restrictions

Will return events for the specified eventType only. See the league specific eventTypes decode endpoint for a complete list of event types available for any given league.
  Default - All event types

The encyclopedia returns full career and season-by-season totals.
  The encyclopedia is valid for a single player only.

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: Cricket - Leaders

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the cricket/leagues endpoint

Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Bowling).

This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties).

To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Traliers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

Will return events from a specific series. See the league specific series decode endpoint for a complete list of series available for any given league.
 Default - No series restrictions

Will return events for the specified eventType only. See the league specific eventTypes decode endpoint for a complete list of event types available for any given league.
  Default - All event types

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: Cricket - Decodes

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the cricket/leagues endpoint
The data type to be decoded.

For seasonStructure only. To get complete history of league, select allSeasons=TRUE. Only those permissioned for all historic data will be able to utilize the 'allSeasons' option.
  Default - false

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json
